DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: RODRIGUES, CM;RODRIGUES, CLENILSON;RODRIGUES, M. RODRIGUES;RODRIGUES, MARTINS CLENILSON;RODRIGUES, CLENILSON M;RODRIGUES, C.M.;RODRIGUES, CLENILSON MARTINS;RODRIGUES, CLENILSON M.;MARTINS RODRIGUES, CLENILSON

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Bacharel em Qumica pela Universidade Federal de Gois - UFG (2000), Mestre em Qumica com atribuies na rea de Qumica Analtica (IQ/UFG 2003), Doutor em Qumica pelo Instituto de Qumica da UNESP de Araraquara com atribuies na rea de Qumica dos Produtos Naturais (IQ/UNESP 2007). Ps-doutorado (IQ/UNESP 2010) na rea de Qumica dos Produtos Naturais com especializao em tcnicas cromatogrficas, dicrosmo circular, ressonncia magntica nuclear e espectrometria de massas. Tem experincia na rea de Qumica, com nfase em instrumentao analtica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: reaes de complexao de metais de transio (MT) com ativao por micro-ondas; anlises de MT por injeo em fluxo; especiao de MT por absoro atmica (FAAS); quantificao de feromnios por GC-MS/SIM; preparo de amostras por SPE; separao de metablitos secundrios utilizando o conceito "scale-up" em sistemas LC e com foco em substncias de alta polaridade; caracterizao/elucidao estrutural de substncias naturais por mtodos espectroscpicos e espectromtricos; desenvolvimento de mtodos cromatogrficos empregados na anlise de matrizes vegetais, biolgicas e ambientais por HPLC e tcnicas cromatogrficas afins; padronizao de extratos vegetais; caracterizao de plantas com atividade biolgica por tcnicas de espectrometria de massas multicolisionais diretas ou acopladas com UHPLC. Realizou estgio de aperfeioamento em tcnicas de Espectrometria de Massas, no qual abordou o uso de MALDI-TOF-MS aplicada caracterizao polimrica de proantocianidinas em matrizes vegetais, estgio realizado no Centro di Spettrometria di Massa Proteomica e Biomolecolare - Istituto di Scienze dell'Alimentazione del Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche - Italy. Atualmente Pesquisador ?A? da Embrapa Agroenergia e atua em temas relacionados caracterizao estrutural de substncias naturais, incluindo as de alta polaridade; separao de compostos qumicos de valor agregado obtidos por processos de (bio)converso de lignina, xilose e glicerina; desenvolvimento e aplicao de metodologias analticas voltadas para estudos qualitativos, quantitativos e de cintica de transformao/degradao de marcadores qumicos em processos biotecnolgicos; obteno e correlao do metaboloma de estudos voltados qumica de biomassa energtica. Uso de coprodutos das correntes agroindustriais como matria-prima para a obteno de agroqumicos de origem renovvel. Orientou cerca de 20 bolsistas distribudos nas modalidades PIBIC, DTI e Capes/EMBRAPA, includo desde alunos de iniciao cientfica e ps-doutores. Tem experincia na coordenao ou participao em projetos de inovao aberta com a iniciativa privada e fomentados pelo BNDES e EMBRAPII (2014-2022), projetos ligados aos temas de bioeconomia e economia circular. membro titular do Comit Tcnico Interno da Embrapa Agroenergia e membro do portflio Energia, Qumica e Tecnologia da Biomassa. Exerceu a funo de coordenador/presidente do Observatrio de Tendncias da Embrapa Agroenergia (2016-2018), perodo em que contribuiu com a implementao de metodologia de avaliao de big data relacionado aos temos de interesse da agenda institucional da Embrapa Agroenergia..
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Bachelor's at Chemistry from Federal University of Gois (2000), master's at Chemistry from Federal University of Gois (2003) and doctorate at Chemistry from So Paulo State University (2007). Has experience in Chemistry, focusing on Chemistry of Natural Products and Analytical Chemistry, acting on the following subjects: Isolation and characterization of polar compouds, HPLC and MS methods development.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Aprovado no Concurso Pblico realizado pela EMBRAPA (DOU S.3, E.119, Pg.5, de 24 de junho de 2010). Cargo: Pesquisador nvel A na Unidade de Agroenergia da Empresa Brasileira de Pesquisa Agropecuria (EMBRAPA). | Aprovado no processo seletivo do IQ-UNESP/FAPESP (n proc. 2010/13995-2) com outorga de bolsa de ps-doutoramento, a ser realizado no Departamento de Qumica Analtica do IQ/UNESP, para atuao no projeto temtico ?Avaliao da ocorrncia, toxicidade/genotoxidade e processos para degradao de corantes em efluentes e guas superficiais? a partir da implementao do subprojeto ?Desenvolvimento de Mtodos Analticos Cromatogrficos para Determinao de Corantes em Amostras de Efluente Txtil?. | Aprovado no Concurso Pblico realizado pelo CPQBA (DOPESP N 41, pg 119, de 4 de maro de 2009). Cargo: Pesquisador nvel III na Unidade de Qumica Analtica da Diviso de Qumica Orgnica e Farmacutica, situada no Centro Pluridisciplinar de Pesquisas Qumicas e Agrcolas (CPQBA) da Universidade Estadual de Campinas (UNICAMP).

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Tcnicas avanadas de espectrometria de massas para anlise de compostos txicos em tortas, folhas e leo de Pinho-Manso (Jatropha curcas)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Os steres de forbol so os principais componentes txicos presentes na torta de pinho-manso e quando ingeridos podem agir no organismo de forma aguda (resposta inflamatria intensa) ou crnica (induo de tumor). Neste sentido, grande o interesse em eliminar ou reduzir estes compostos das tortas de pinho-manso. No Brasil, a Embrapa est utilizando estratgias de melhoramento gentico, para obter cultivares no txicas, quanto de processos fsicos, qumicos e biolgicos para remover ou reduzir a concentrao das substncias indesejadas. Para auxiliar tais pesquisas, necessrio empregar tcnicas analticas que permitam obter informaes precisas e exatas em curto espao de tempo. O monitoramento da eficincia e eficcia destes processos indispensvel para garantir o uso seguro das tortas e, como consequncia, garantir a agregao de valor s cadeias produtivas dessa cultura.Com o objetivo de prover mtodos rpidos, eficientes e simples para monitorar a eficincia das estratgias de destoxificao de tortas de pinho-manso, o presente projeto de pesquisa tem como foco desenvolver metodologias para detectar e quantificar compostos txicos, principalmente steres de forbol, em tortas, folhas e leos de pinho-manso aplicando tcnicas de ionizao ambiente: EASI, LTP, paper e leaf spray.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Tcnicas avanadas de espectrometria de massas para anlise de compostos txicos em tortas, folhas e leo de Pinho-Manso (Jatropha curcas)

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Caracterizao de marcadores qumicos em processos biotecnolgicos
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Reconhecer grupos de substncias que podero ser correlacionadas com diversas variveis, incluindo desde a diferenciao molecular encontrada em espcies de alta produtividade para a cadeia de agroenergia, obtidas por processos de melhoramento gentico; Mapeamento de precursores moleculares de rotas biossintticas (estudo metabolmico visando o reconhecimento de etapas limitantes ou preterveis); Monitoramento de marcadores qumicos produzidos a partir de processos (bio)tecnolgicos (pr-tratamentos qumicos para a desconstruo de biomassa, processos de converso qumica etc.); Avaliao de processos de biotransformao (determinao de marcadores qumicos produzidos a partir de fungos endofticos, bactrias, leveduras etc.)

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Metabolmica targeted e untargeted aplicada na prospeco de qumicos de valor agregado
Qumica de Biomassa e suas aplicaes em Biorrefinarias

Desenvolvimento e validao de metodologias voltadas Qumica Verde e Cromatografia Verde

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Genmica funcional, transcriptmica e metabolmica, de leveduras fermentadoras de xilose para aumento da eficincia na produo de etanol de segunda gerao (YEASTOMICS)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Mapeamento metabolmico de espcies de leveduras fermentadoras de xilose com vistas identificao de etapas limitantes em suas rotas biossintticas, as quais auxiliaram o melhoramento gentico e desenvolvimento de linhagens mais eficientes para a produo de etanol de segunda gerao.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Mapeamento metabolmico de espcies de leveduras fermentadoras de xilose com vistas identificao de etapas limitantes em suas rotas biossintticas, as quais auxiliaram o melhoramento gentico e desenvolvimento de linhagens mais eficientes para a produo de etanol de segunda gerao.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Avanos tecnolgicos na produo de bio-leo, gs de sntese, hidrognio e etanol a partir de biomassa florestal
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Atualmente, existe uma forte tendncia mundial em se priorizar P&D&I na direo de tecnologias que contribuam para conferir maior sustentabilidade ambiental, maior qualidade de energia e segurana de fornecimento. A utilizao de biomassas promovendo substituio total ou parcial de combustveis fsseis tem a vantagem de apresentar um ciclo fechado de gerao e consumo de CO2, sendo vista, atualmente, como a fonte de energia mais promissora para mitigar a emisso de gases do efeito estufa. A biomassa lignocelulsica constitui uma importante fonte renovvel de energia, especialmente no Brasil, que possui grandes reas para plantao e condies climticas e ambientais favorveis. A rea de florestas tem concentrado grande interesse pela possibilidade, cada vez mais evidenciada, da sua utilizao em oportunidades bioenergticas e, neste setor, o Brasil tem um grande potencial competitivo por possuir a melhor tecnologia no mundo para a implantao, manejo e explorao de floresta de eucaliptos. Dentro deste contexto, com o desenvolvimento deste projeto busca-se um conhecimento multidisciplinar, com uma viso cientfica e tecnolgica, para converso de biomassa florestal em energia por meio de rotas termoqumicas (pirlise e gaseificao) ou bioqumicas (hidrlise enzimtica e fermentao). O objetivo do projeto consiste em estudar, desenvolver e avaliar as referidas rotas tecnolgicas para obteno de produtos de maior valor agregado, a saber: bio-leo, resduo slido carbonoso, gs de sntese, hidrognio e etanol, baseado no conceito de biorrefinaria. Os planos de ao tcnicos 1 e 4 visam a produo de etanol por rota bioqumica utilizando, biomassas florestais pr-tratadas e resduo da indstria de reciclagem de papel, respectivamente. O plano de ao 2 pretende testar as biomassas florestais, para produo de bio-leo (pirlise) e gs de sntese (gaseificao), enquanto o Plano de ao 3 visa a obteno de hidrognio por gaseificao de biomassa e celulignina por gua supercrtica, integrada com gerao termoeltrica. Para o desenvolvimento dos planos de ao haver orientaes no sentido de que o projeto seja desenvolvido de acordo com os princpios de Boas Prticas de Laboratrio e tambm contar com apoio no componente gerencial da gesto de projetos como complemento aos padres do Sistema Embrapa de Gesto. Os planos de ao possuem um forte carter tecnolgico e incluem uma avaliao preliminar da viabilidade tcnica e econmica dos processos.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Avanos tecnolgicos na produo de bio-leo, gs de sntese, hidrognio e etanol a partir de biomassa florestal

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Rotas tecnolgicas para a produo sustentvel de etanol de celulose (ETANOL2G)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Atualmente o etanol produzido a partir de matrias-primas como a cana-de-acar e amido de cereais, mas, em mdio a longo prazo ser estratgico produzir etanol a partir de biomassa lignocelulsica. O uso da biomassa lignocelulsica diminuiria consideravelmente a competio pelo uso da terra para produo de alimentos, ao mesmo tempo em que constitui matria-prima mais barata que as normalmente empregadas para este propsito. Ainda, os biocombustveis elaborados de biomassa lignocelulsica geram baixas emisses de gases de efeito estufa, reduzindo impactos ambientais, especialmente os procedentes das mudanas climticas. O presente projeto tem como objetivo estabelecer um processo integrado de produo de etanol celulsico determinando-se as melhores condies de pr-tratamento, hidrlise enzimtica e fermentao, bem como processos de aproveitamento de resduos e co-produtos provenientes destas diferentes etapas. Uma vez que as rotas tecnolgicas so dependentes da matria-prima, neste projeto sero tratados dois materiais de grande relevncia para o Brasil, e com estrutura contrastante em termos de composio qumica e estrutura da parede celular: uma espcie de forrageira (capim elefante) e um resduo agroindustrial (bagao de cana-de-acar). Para alcanar esse objetivo, neste projeto: (i) sero implantadas metodologias padres e desenvolvidas metodologias analticas rpidas e ?verdes?, utilizando tcnicas de cromatografia lquida de ultra-alta eficincia acopladas a diversos detectores, incluindo a espectrometria de massas (MS), para caracterizao das fraes da biomassa e determinao de inibidores formados no pr-tratamento; (ii) sero avaliados diferentes tipos de pr-tratamento (termoalcalino, cido e exploso a vapor) e um desses ser indicado para cada matria prima estudada; (iii) sero desenvolvidos biocatalisadores ativos e estveis (com enzimas livres ou imobilizadas por mtodos de baixo custo) e definidas as melhores condies de hidrlise de capim elefante a bagao de cana de acar pr-tratados; (iv) sero recomendadas cepas de microrganismos capazes de fermentar pentoses e hexoses a etanol com alto desempenho e ser definido um processo, em escala de bancada, para a fermentao das fraes hidrolisadas das matrias-primas propostas; (v) ser avaliado, em escala de bancada, o potencial de risco ambiental dos resduos slidos e dos efluentes gerados nos processos estudados e sero recomendadas aplicaes para estes resduos, num contexto de biorrefinaria (vi) sero definidas estratgias de integrao das etapas de pr-tratamento, hidrlise enzimtica e fermentao de pentoses e hexoses para cada matria-prima; (vii) sero desenvolvidos modelos matemticos e feitos estudos de pr-viabilidade tcnica e econmica considerando resultados de bancada para cada etapa do processo separadamente e do processo integrado. Observa-se que a organizao do projeto aborda os gargalos tcnico-cientficos de PD&I e acompanha as etapas/componentes da rota tecnolgica. Ser dedicado especial empenho na formao de uma plataforma de pesquisa integrando os esforos correntes no tema, dentro da Empresa. Assim, haver planos de ao com grande interface com projetos j em andamento, visando maior integrao dos diversos processos envolvidos na produo de etanol celulsico.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Rotas tecnolgicas para a produo sustentvel de etanol de celulose (ETANOL2G)

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Uma abordagem mica para definir o papel do liquido do apoplasto na interao das estirpes do inoculante e a planta de cana-de-acar (GENMETABAC)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: No contexto atual do programa de Agricultura de Baixo Carbono (Programa ABC), a busca por alternativas biolgicas que reduzam o uso de fertilizantes nitrogenados tem sido uma das prioridades do governo brasileiro. Neste sentido, o desenvolvimento de inoculantes tem sido uma das prioridades das pesquisas na Embrapa Agrobiologia, que ao longo dos ltimos 60 anos, tm procurado aprofundar o conhecimento sobre a interao planta-bactria visando obter o mximo de eficincia do inoculante aplicado na cultura de cana-de-acar. O inoculante desenvolvido para a cultura de cana-de-acar culminou na seleo de consrcio de cinco bactrias diazotrficas endofticas que se mostrou superior a outras combinaes de estirpes tanto na produo de colmos como no N acumulado nos tecidos derivado do processo de fixao biolgica de nitrognio (FBN) na var. SP 701143. Respostas similares foram observadas em outras variedades de cana (ex. RB867515), mas no para todas as variedades inoculadas e cultivadas em diferentes locais indicando uma forte interao gentipo x solo x ambiente. Diferentemente de outras culturas, a inoculao de cana pode ocorrer por meio de plantas micropropagadas (pouco prtico) ou da imerso dos colmos em suspenso de bactrias (cana planta) ou ainda, pulverizao (cana soca). No caso de toletes, as bactrias inoculadas tm que competir com a microflora natural presente e, portanto, o sucesso da inoculao depende da capacidade das estirpes em colonizar nichos especficos da planta como, por exemplo, os espaos intercelulares de tecidos vegetais (apoplasto), onde se estabelecem sem causar sintomas aparentes de doenas. Esse habitat representa um canal de comunicao extremamente dinmico entre os compartimentos das plantas e potencialmente atua como um meio de transduo de sinais do ambiente para o simplasto onde desempenha papel importante no transporte de gua e nutrientes, sinais intercelulares e interao planta-bactria. Anlises microscpicas tm mostrado a presena de diversas espcies de bactrias diazotrficas endofticas no lquido do apoplasto de cana-de-acar inclusive das estirpes do inoculante. Todas essas informaes reforam a hiptese de que o apoplasto um dos nichos apropriados para o estabelecimento e atividade metablica da bactria, incluindo a FBN e produo de substncias promotoras de crescimento vegetal; no entanto, desconhecemos como se d a interao entre as estirpes do inoculante nas variedades responsivas e porque a resposta no comum a todas as variedades. Neste sentido, este projeto prope usar o lquido do apoplasto da variedade RB867515 para definir um modelo de expresso gnica e produo de metablitos das cinco bactrias cultivadas individualmente ou em mistura no laboratrio. A anlise conjunto dos dados obtidos pela abordagem ?mica? (transcriptmica, protemica e metabolmica) permitir inferir se os genes diferencialmente expressos na variedade RB867515 apresentam o mesmo comportamento nas variedades de cana-de-acar que apresentam resposta diferenciada ao inoculante. possvel que sejam encontrados sinais moleculares e metablitos que possam ser usados como indicadores na seleo de variedades responsivas a inoculao com bactrias diazotrficas endofticas.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Uma abordagem mica para definir o papel do liquido do apoplasto na interao das estirpes do inoculante e a planta de cana-de-acar (GENMETABAC)

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-COMPLETO: Bruno dos Santos Alves Figueiredo Brasil

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Implantao de uma plataforma instrumental na Embrapa Agroenergia para realizao de anlises voltadas Qumica Verde e Cromatografia Verde (GREENLAB)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: DESATIVADO POR CORTES EM INVESTIMENTO. A preocupao com a preservao do meio ambiente tem ampliado aes e pesquisas que buscam novas solues tecnolgicas que permitam evitar ou minimizar a gerao de resduos em processos industriais e laboratoriais. Tambm notria a busca por fontes renovveis que possam complementar e minimizar os efeitos relacionados ao aquecimento global e s mudanas climticas. Neste sentido, trabalhos que empregam diversos tipos de biomassas, no contexto de biorrefinarias para a produo de compostos qumicos e biocombustveis, esto sendo realizados mundialmente. Na Embrapa, a Embrapa Agroenergia tem abordado este assunto e atualmente possui vrios projetos em andamento com foco nesta linha de pesquisa. Contudo, durante os processos de converso da biomassa ainda so usados protocolos analticos extremamente morosos e com demasiada gerao de solventes agressivos ao meio ambiente. Portanto, percebe-se certa contradio no fato de estudos que buscam estas alternativas renovveis necessitarem de ferramentas analticas que no sejam ambientalmente amigveis e sustentveis. Desta forma, na Embrapa Agroenergia as abordagens tcnico-cientficas no buscam somente novos biocombustveis, compostos qumicos renovveis, matrias-primas e estirpes altamente produtivas, mas tambm a utilizao de tcnicas e metodologias analticas para avaliao e acompanhamento destes produtos de forma menos impactante para o meio ambiente e para a sociedade. Nesta proposta esto sendo solicitados equipamentos ainda no contemplados na infraestrutura da Unidade e que trabalham empregando o conceito de cromatografia verde para estabelecer uma plataforma analtica multiusurio. Esta solicitao tem completa aderncia com a linha temtica da Unidade, que pode ser resumida em atividades de pesquisas que buscam solues sustentveis e ambientalmente inovadoras. Os equipamentos contribuiro para manter a sustentabilidade de vrios processos em desenvolvimento na Embrapa Agroenergia, seja com parceiros internos e externos, permitindo o monitoramento das variveis analticas que apontaro os melhores resultados das pesquisas nas mais diferentes reas de atuao. Como exemplos tm-se: avaliao e melhoramento gentico de matrias-primas com foco em materiais tolerantes aos estresses biticos e abiticos; prospeco e melhoramento gentico de microrganismos efetivos na converso de substratos agroindustriais em novos compostos qumicos; avaliao da eficincia de processos de converso com o estudo de suas variveis para obteno de produto final e a verificao da correspondncia entre os parmetros relacionados mudana de escala. Neste contexto, a cromatografia verde, associada a equipamentos que apresentam notria frequncia analtica, podero contribuir de forma imprescindvel, rpida e precisa para a obteno dos resultados previstos em projetos em desenvolvimento ou em novos projetos. Esta abordagem contribuir para a obteno de novos produtos, processos e tecnologias de elevado impacto para o setor produtivo e para a sociedade. Alm de contribuir para o alcance dos principais ativos de inovao almejados nos projetos que sero atendidos (bancos microbianos; linhagens, estirpes ou cepas; processos de converso etc.), a aquisio dos equipamentos solicitados na proposta tambm viabilizar a implementao de uma linha temtica extremamente necessria e consonante ao tema da Unidade, visto que ela corroborar com a mitigao da gerao de efluentes durante as anlises, os quais so passivos dos atuais mtodos analticos, trar economia energtica a todo o processo, uma vez que as anlises sero mais rpidas, reduzindo tempo de mquina e do operador. Sendo assim, esta proposta poder contribuir de forma efetiva em temas abordados pelos portflios: Palma de leo, Qumica e Tecnologia da Biomassa; Sucroalcooleiro Energtico.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Desenvolvimento de mtodos analticos para identificao e monitoramento de compostos qumicos de valor agregado produzidos a partir da bioconverso de glicerina (CHEMSEARCH)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O crescimento da cadeia produtiva dos biocombustveis, especificamente do biodiesel (BD), est levando ao acmulo de coprodutos relacionados. Dentre eles, destaca-se a glicerina bruta, formada na proporo de 1 litro para cada 10 litros de BD produzido. O excesso deste coproduto, aliado aos elevados custos de purificao, far com que seu valor comercial agregado diminua ao longo dos anos, proporcionalmente ao crescimento da indstria de biocombustveis. A introduo do BD na matriz energtica brasileira, obrigatria por lei desde janeiro de 2008, tem estimulado a diversificao desta matriz energtica, com a introduo, por exemplo, de outras matrias-primas, uma vez que a soja sozinha contribui com mais 70% da produo do BD. Com a maior oferta de BD h tambm o aumento da glicerina bruta no pas. Diante deste cenrio, faz-se necessrio o desenvolvimento de estratgias de aproveitamento deste coproduto e neste caso, as biorrefinarias despontam como alternativa promissora e sustentvel, com a proposta de produzir compostos de maior valor agregado e a partir desta fonte de carbono abundante, - a glicerina bruta -, seja por meio de processos qumicos e/ou bioqumicos. Os poliis, diis e alguns cidos carboxlicos so classes de substncias de maior valor agregado se comparados glicerina bruta, podendo-se estabelec-los como grupo de substncias de interesse (building blocks) no desenvolvimento de processos em biorrefinarias. Nesse contexto, imperativo o desenvolvimento e a validao de metodologias analticas capazes de monitorar (qualitativamente e quantitativamente) substncias com alto grau de hidroxilao e polaridade, como poliis, diis e cidos carboxlicos que podem ser obtidos nas etapas de bioconverso de glicerina bruta. A cromatografia de interao hidroflica (HILIC) apresenta grande potencial de aplicao na separao de substncias com estas caractersticas e quando associada com a cromatografia lquida de ultra eficincia (UPLC), acoplada com tcnicas de deteco como a espectrometria de massas tandem (MS/MS), espalhamento de luz evaporativo (ELSD) e ndice de refrao (RID), torna-se vivel a proposio de metodologias capazes de diferenciar, de forma inequvoca, a formao destas substncias de alto valor agregado, incluindo a diferenciao de suas formas isomricas, caractersticas que no so contempladas pelos mtodos disponveis atualmente. Assim, este projeto prope o estabelecimento de novas metodologias baseadas em HILIC-UPLC-MS/MS, HILIC-UPLC-ELSD e HILIC-UPLC-RID para monitorar bioprocessos de converso da glicerina bruta proveniente de coprodutos de vrios resduos industriais. Assim, os protocolos de anlises desenvolvidos tero grande impacto na etapa de prospeco de bancos microbianos e contribuir na seleo de microrganismos (a saber: fungos, bactrias, leveduras etc.) com potencial capacidade de converter glicerina bruta em substncias de maior valor agregado, bem como dar subsdios para a escolha dos melhores parmetros operacionais envolvidos nos processos de bioconverso. Desta forma, alm de garantir a proposio de novos protocolos analticos capazes de avaliar elevado nmero de amostras, dentro do conceito de ?high-throughput analysis?, o desenvolvimento do projeto atender no apenas estudos que visam agregar valor cadeia de produo do BD, mas servir de referncia para avaliar a aplicao dos conceitos das biorrefinarias em coprodutos de outras biomassas, sejam elas oleaginosas, amilceas, lignocelulsicas, dentre outras.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Prospeco de extratos e compostos bioativos de fungos e plantas para aplicao no controle de fitonematoides (NEMATUS)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto visa estabelecer processos de obteno de extratos naturais, a partir de coprodutos e resduos das cadeias da agroenergia e agroindstrias, com o objetivo de obter pesticidas naturais que possam ser usados no controle de fitonematoides, em especial para o controle de Meloidogyne incognita.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Ncleo de Genmica, Protemica, Metabolmica e Enzimologia em Biorrefinarias
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O Projeto foi aprovado no edital 07/2018: Programa de Apoio a Nucleos de Excelncia PRONEX/FAPDF/CNPQ coordenado pelo prof. Marcelo Valle de Sousa da Universidade de Braslia.
A presente proposta do ?Ncleo de Genmica, Protemica, Metablomica e Enzimologia em Biorrefinarias? surge como continuao e ampliao natural do ncleo de Excelncia estabelecido em resposta a edital Pronex anterior da FAPDF e denominado ?Ncleo de Genmica, Protemica e Enzimologia de Fungos e Bactrias Anaerbicas Lignoceluloliticos?. Ao fim do projeto anterior, algumas perspectivas para projetos futuros foram definidas: a) Continuar aplicando genmica, protemica e enzimologia sobre fungos e bactrias, porem utilizando agora tcnicas muito mais modernas, que foram implantadas durante o projeto; b) Passar a usar fungos e bactrias como produtores no apenas de enzimas lignoceluloliticas, mas tambm de aminocidos para uso em aplicaes biotecnolgicas, qumicas e farmacuticas; c) Passar a usar fungos, bactrias e suas enzimas em biorrefinarias no apenas para produo de bioetanol, mas tambm para produo de outras molculas de interesses biotecnolgico, qumico e farmacutico a partir de substratos e resduos agroindustriais.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Fortalecer o desenvolvimento da bioeconomia no Brasil atravs de projetos que investiguem a situao e perspectivas desse setor, processos de inovao, experincias internacionais e fatores que contribuem para a definio de estratgias e polticas pblicas para a expanso da bioeconomia nacional.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Estgio de aperfeioamento em tcnicas de Espectrometria de Massas, no qual abordou o uso de MALDI-TOF-MS aplicada caracterizao polimrica de proantocianidinas em matrizes vegetais.

Professor do Programa de Ps Graduao em Energia e Ambiente vinculado ao Instituto Nacional de Cincia e Tecnologia. O INCT de Energia e Ambiente uma rede nacional de grupos de pesquisa, formada para estudar, de forma concertada, a preparao de biocombustveis, associada valorizao dos co-produtos; a formulao e certificao de combustveis e de misturas de combustveis fsseis e biocombustveis; a combusto em motores estacionrios e em dinammetro de rolos; e o impacto dos gases e material particulado (em escala micromtrica e nanomtrica) emitidos na atmosfera de centros urbanos brasileiros.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Byrsonima crassa Niedenzu (IK): antimicrobial activity and chemical study

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista de Cincias Farmacuticas Bsica e Aplicada

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alba Regina Monteiro de Souza Brito

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The methanolic extract of leaves from Byrsonima crassa, a Brazilian medicinal plant, was analyzed by CC and HPLC. Four constituents were isolated and identified as quercetin, methyl gallate, (-)-epigallocatechin gallate and quercetin-3-O-(2"-galloyl)-alfa-arabinopyranoside. The methanolic and hydromethanolic extract, as well as fractions, were evaluated regarding their possible antimicrobial activity using in vitro methods. Results showed that both extracts and fractions exhibited significant antimicrobial activity against all tested strains.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Fast preparative separation of flavones from capitula of Eriocaulon ligulatum (Vell.) L.B.Smith (Eriocaulaceae) by High-speed countercurrent chromatography (HSCCC)

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista de Cincias Farmacuticas Bsica e Aplicada

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: High-speed countercurrent chromatography (HSCCC) is a leading method for the fast separation of natural products from plants. It was used for the preparative isolation of two flavone monoglucosides present in the capitula of Eriocaulon ligulatum (Vell.) L. B. Smith (Eriocaulaceae). This species, known locally as ″boto dourado″, is exported to Europe, Japan and North America as an ornamental species, constituting an important source of income for the local population of Minas Gerais State, Brazil. The solvent system, optimized in tests prior to the HSCCC run, consisted of the two phases of the mixture ethyl acetate: n-propanol: water (140:8:80, v/v/v), which led to the successful separation of 6-methoxyluteolin-7-O-beta-D-allopyranoside and 6-methoxyapigenin-7-O-beta-D-allopyranoside in only 3 hours. The two flavonoids were identified by NMR (1-D and 2-D) and ESI-MS, comparing their spectra with published data.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Preparative isolation of a novel flavonoid from an infusion of Byrsonima basiloba leaves by high-speed counter-current chromatography

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alba Regina Monteiro de Souza Brito

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A method for the isolation of three compounds from the infusion of leaves of Byrsonima basiloba A. Juss. by high-speed counter-current chromatography (HSCCC) was developed. This technique led to the separation of a novel compound, quercetin 3-O-alfa-L-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→3)-O-[alfa-L-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→6)]-beta-D-allopyranoside, and two known compounds quercetin- 3-O-alfa-L-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→6)-beta-D-galactopyranoside and (+)-catechin in 4 h with purities of over 92%. The structures of the compounds were determined by one- and two-dimensional NMR spectroscopy and HPLC.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Flavonides de Calotropis procera R. Br. (Asclepiadaceae)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Flavonoids of Calotropis procera R. Br. (Asclepiadaceae)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In this work we report the identification of two flavonol glycosides isolated from the leaves of Calotropis procera R. Br. (Asclepiadaceae), a plant species with large occurrence in Northwest of Brazil with some applications in folk medicine. Some proved pharmacological activities in this species could be attributed to the presence of flavonol glycosides. The extraction and isolation of flavonol glycosides was carried out firstly by a liquid-liquid partition, and then by elution of n-BuOH fraction with MeOH over a Sephadex LH-20 column. The identification of flavonol glycosides isorhamnetin-3-O-rutinoside (1), and isorhamnetin-3-O-robinobioside (2), was obtained by 1H and 13C NMR, one- and two dimensional techniques.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Identification of ellagic acid derivatives in methanolic extracts from Qualea species

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Zeitschrift fr Naturforschung. C, A Journal of Biosciences

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The methanolic extract from the barks of the medicinal plant Qualea parviflora (Vochysiaceae) was fractionated by column chromatography over silica gel followed by gel permeation over Sephadex LH-20 to give 3,3'-di-O-methylellagic acid 4-O-beta-glucopyranoside (1), 3-O-methylellagic acid-4'-O-alfa-rhamnopyranoside (2), 3,3',4-tri-O-methylellagic acid-4'-O-beta-glucopyranoside (3), and 3,3'-di-O-methylellagic acid (4), together with triterpenes and saponins. We also performed comparative analyses among this species and Q. grandiflora and Q. multiflora using high-pressure liquid chromatography. The biological assays showed that, when compared to the standard ellagic acid, compounds 1-4 are less cytotoxic but have a lower capacity of stimulating murine peritoneal macrophages to release nitric oxide and tumoural-alfa necrose factor.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Isolated Flavonoids against Mammary Tumour Cells LM2

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Zeitschrift fr Naturforschung. C, A Journal of Biosciences

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The purpose of the present study was to investigate antitumour and anti-infl ammatory activities of flavonoids isolated from Byrsonima crassa, Davilla elliptica and Mouriri pusa. The antitumour activity was measured by the MTT assay in murine mammary tumour cells (LM2) and the IC50 values of the flavonoids tested ranged from (31.5 2.97) to (203.1 5.9) ug/ml. The flavonoids 1 (myricetin-3-O-rhamnopyranoside) and 3 (quercetin-3-Ogalactopyranoside) from D. elliptica were the most active ones against the tumour cells. The same samples were tested to determine the inhibition of the release of nitric oxide (NO) and of the tumour necrosis factor-alpha (TNF-alfa) in murine macrophages by the Griess and ELISA sandwich assay, respectively. Almost all the samples showed inhibitory activity to the release of NO but not of TNF-alfa. Of all substances tested, flavonoids 2 (quercetin) and 6 (myricetin) may show promising activity in the treatment of murine breast cancer by immunomodulatory and antiproliferative activities.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Characterization of flavonoid and naphthopyranone derivatives from Eriocaulon ligulatum using liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Liquid chromatography-electrospray ionization multistage ion trap mass spectrometry (LC-ESI-IT-MSn) was used to analyze the secondary metabolites in the methanol extract of the capitulae of Eriocaulon ligulatum. The major components were mono and diglycosides of flavonoids and naphthopyranones. Eleven compounds, including four new flavonol glycosides, were identified based on their fragmentation patterns in MS experiments and on NMR analysis of the isolated compounds. The described data may contribute to a better understanding of the taxonomic classification of the Eriocaulaceae family.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Mutagenic effect of native species of the Brazilian ?Cerrado? with anti-ulcerogenic activity

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neea theifera Oerted (Nyctaginaceae), Guapira noxia Linn. (Nyctaginaceae) and Hancornia speciosa Gomes (Apocynaceae) are plant species found in Brazilian ?Cerrado? used popularly for the treatment of gastric ulcers. Here they are assessed for mutagenic activity by analysis of the reverse mutations induced in Salmonella typhimurium strains TA100, TA98, TA102 and TA97a, by extracts of the plants, with and without metabolic activation. Methanol and chloroform extracts of N. theifera and G. noxia and methanolic and aqueous extracts of H. speciosa were tested at five different concentrations. It was found that only the methanolic extract of H. speciosa exhibited a positive mutagenic effect, on strains TA98 and TA100 in the absence of metabolic activation. The phytochemical analysis of the species suggested that condensed tannins are the main compounds responsible for the observed effect.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Application of preparative high-speed counter-current chromatography for the separation of flavonoids from the leaves of Byrsonima crassa Niedenzu (IK)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Application of preparative high-speed counter-current chromatography for the separation of flavonoids from the leaves of Byrsonima crassa Niedenzu (IK)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The methanolic extract of the leaves of the medicinal plant Byrsonima crassa (Malpighiaceae) contain flavonoids with antioxidant activity. They were separated in a preparative scale using high-speed counter-current chromatography. The optimum solvent system used was composed of a mixture of ethyl acetate?n-propanol?water (140:8:80 (v/v/v)) and led to a successful separation between monoglucosilated flavonoids (quercetin-3-O-α-l-arabinoside, quercetin-3-O-β-d-galactoside) and the biflavonoid amentoflavone in only 3.5 h. The purities of quercetin-3-O-α-l-arabinoside (95 mg), quercetin-3-O-β-d-galactoside (16 mg) and the biflavonoid amentoflavone (114 mg) were all isolated at purity over 95%. Identification was performed by 1H NMR, 13C NMR and UV analyses.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Quantification of sex pheromone from Anocentor nitens by gas chromatography-mass spectrometry-selected ion monitoring
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Quantification of sex pheromone from Anocentor nitens by gas chromatography?mass spectrometry?selected ion monitoring

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Two highly sensitive and selective methods based on gas chromatography coupled to mass spectrometry (GC?MS) in the selected ion monitoring (SIM) mode have been developed for the quantification of 2,6-dichlorophenol (2,6-DCP), a sex pheromone of the tick females of Anocentor nitens. Standard addition method and calibration curve techniques using 5-bromine-4-hydroxy-3-methoxybenzaldehyde (5-BrV) as internal standard (IS) afforded detection limit of 0.1 ng ml−1. The calibration curve was linear over the concentration range from 0.5 to 500 ng ml−1 for 2,6-DCP. Results show that the concentration range of sex pheromone in the extracts samples was 1.08?10.35 ng ml−1. The methods developed provided reliable procedures to determine amounts of 2,6-DCP present in ticks.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Chemical profile of Eriocaulon ligulatum (Vell.) L.B. Smith (Eriocaulaceae)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Chemical profile of Eriocaulon ligulatum (Vell.) L.B. Smith (Eriocaulaceae)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Two new and six known flavonoids and two known naphthopyranones have been isolated by chromatographic methods and spectrometrically identified in capitulae and scapes of Eriocaulon ligulatum (Vell.) L.B. Smith (Eriocaulaceae). The presence of naphthopyranones suggests approximation between Eriocaulon and Paepalanthus genus.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Preparative separation of flavonoids from the medicinal plant Davilla elliptica St. Hill. by high-speed counter-current chromatography
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Preparative separation of flavonoids from the medicinal plant Davilla elliptica St. Hill. by high-speed counter-current chromatography

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: BRITO, ALBA REGINA MONTEIRO DE SOUZA
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: BRITO, ALBA REGINA MONTEIRO DE SOUZA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: High-speed counter-current chromatography (HSCCC) is a major tool for the fast separation of natural products from plants. It was used for the preparative isolation of the flavonoid monoglucosides present in the aerial parts of the Davilla elliptica St. Hill. (Dilleniaceae). This species is used in Brazilian folk medicine for the treatment of gastric disorders. The optimum solvent system used was composed of a mixture of ethyl acetate-n-propanol-water (140:8:80, v/v/v) and led to a successful separation of quercetin-3-O-a-L-rhamnopyranoside and myricetin-3-O-a-L-rhamnopyranoside in approximately 3.0 hours with purity higher than 95%. Identification was performed by 1H NMR, 13C NMR and HPLC-UV-DAD analyses.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Antiulcerogenic activity of Alchornea castaneaefolia: Effects on somatostatin, gastrin and prostaglandin
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Antiulcerogenic activity of Alchornea castaneaefolia: Effects on somatostatin, gastrin and prostaglandin

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The hydroethanolic extract of the leaves (HEL) and bark (HEB) obtained from Alchornea castaneaefolia (Euphorbiaceae) were investigated for their ability to prevent ulceration of the gastric mucosa in animal models. HEL (500 and 1000 mg/kg) and HEB (1000 mg/kg) significantly reduced the gastric injuries induced by the combination of HCl/ethanol and lowered the severity of gastric damage formation induced by indomethacin/bethanechol in mice. Further investigation showed that HEL also inhibited formation of ulcers in mice submitted to stress and pylorus ligature, but HEL did not modify gastric juice parameters in Shay mice. HEL was also effective in promoting the healing process in chronic gastric ulcer induced by acetic acid in rats. An enriched flavonoidic fraction (EFF at dose of 100 mg/kg) obtained from HEL reduced gastric lesions induced by HCl/ethanol and indomethacin/bethanechol in mice. Although EFF did not modify the amount of free mucus production by gastric mucosa, it was able to increase prostaglandin production. When administered to rats submitted to ethanol-induced gastric lesions, EFF increased the somatostatin serum levels, while the gastrin serum levels were proportionally decreased. Phytochemical investigation on HEL and EFF led to the isolation of flavonoids glycosides as the main compounds, thus suggesting that these substances may be involved in the observed antiulcer activity.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: In vitro allelopathic effects of extracts and amenthoflavone from Byrsonima crassa (Malpighiaceae)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: In vitro allelopathic effects of extracts and amenthoflavone from Byrsonima crassa (Malpighiaceae)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Extracts and pure amenthoflavone isolated from Byrsonima crassa (Malpighiaceae), a shrub growing in the semi-arid region of Brazil Cerrado, were evaluated in vitro, at different doses, for their effects on tomato seed germination and subsequent growth of seedlings. A hydromethanolic extract showed general stimulatory effects. The EtOAc extract stimulated root elongation and root weight of tomato; shoot elongation was inhibited, while shoot weight was not altered. The pure amenthoflavone isolated from the plant, stimulated shoot elongation at concentrations ranging between 10−4 M and 10−6 M.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Mutagenic evaluation and chemical investigation of Byrsonima intermedia A. Juss. leaf extracts
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Mutagenic evaluation and chemical investigation of Byrsonima intermedia A. Juss. leaf extracts

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Byrsonima intermedia is a native species of the cerrado formation (tropical American savannah). In Brazil, this plant has been used for the treatment of fever, in ulcers, as a diuretic, as antiasthmatics and in skin infections. Members of the genus Byrsonima (Malpighiaceae) are employed not only in the folk medicine but also as food to make juice, jellies and liquor. The aim of this work was to evaluate the mutagenic effects of Byrsonima intermedia, common name ?murici?. Phytochemical analysis of methanol extract furnished (+)-catechin, (−)-epicatechin, quercetin-3-O-β-d-galactopyranoside, methyl gallate, gallic acid, quercetin-3-O-α-l-arabinopyranoside, amentoflavone, quercetin, quercetin-3-O-(2″-O-galloyl)-β-galactopyranoside and quercetin-3-O-(2″-O-galloyl)-α-arabinopyranoside. Methanol, hydromethanol and chloroform extracts were evaluated in mutagenic assay with Salmonella typhimurium (Ames test) and mice (Micronucleus test). The methanolic extract presented signs of mutagenic activity for the strains TA98 and TA100 in the Ames assay. Mutagenicity was not observed in vivo.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: New flavone from the leaves of Neea theifera (Nyctaginaceae)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: New flavone from the leaves of Neea theifera (Nyctaginaceae)

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Journal of the Brazilian Chemical Society (Impresso)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Neea theifera Oerst. (Nyctaginaceae) is widely used in Brazilian folk medicine for the treatment of gastric ulcers and inflammation. Phytochemical investigation of the leaves of Neea theifera afforded the isolation of the new flavone luteolin-7-O-[2''-O-(5'''-O-feruloyl)- b-D-apiofuranosyl]-b-D-glucopyranoside (1) besides the eight-known compounds vitexin, isovitexin, isoorientin, orientin, vicenin-2, chrysoeriol, apigenin and luteolin. Their chemical identification was established by NMR spectroscopic methods including 2D-NMR, as well as UV and ESI-MS analyses.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Metabolic fingerprinting using direct flow injection electrospray ionization tandem mass spectrometry for the characterization of proanthocyanidins from the barks ofHancornia speciosa
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Metabolic fingerprinting using direct flow injection electrospray ionization tandem mass spectrometry for the characterization of proanthocyanidins from the barks of Hancornia speciosa

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: RCM. Rapid Communications in Mass Spectrometry

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Direct flow injection electrospray ionization ion trap tandem mass spectrometry (ESI-IT-MS/MS) was used to investigate the polyphenolic compounds present in an infusion from the barks of Hancornia speciosa Gom. (Apocynaceae), a native Brazilian plant popularly known as ?mangabeira?, used as a source of nutrition and against gastric disorders. After a simple sample filtration pretreatment the characteristic fingerprint of the infusion was performed in negative ion ESI mode in a few minutes. At low capillary-voltage activation, the deprotonated molecules ([M - H]−) were observed and using collision-induced dissociation the product ion spectra showed the presence of a homologous series of B-type proanthocyanidins, as well as another series containing their respective C-glycosylated derivatives, with a degree of polymerization from 1 up to 6 units of interlinked catechins. Therefore, direct flow injection allowed us to identify the key compounds without preparative isolation of the components.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Hancornia speciosa: Indications of gastroprotective, healing and anti-Helicobacter pylori actions
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Hancornia speciosa: Indications of gastroprotective, healing and anti-Helicobacter pylori actions

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Ethnopharmacological relevance
Mangaba (Hancornia speciosa Gomez) is a medicinal plant frequently cited in ethnopharmacological inventories of the central region of Brazil against gastrointestinal disorders such as diarrhoea, ulcer, gastritis and stomachache.

Aim of the study
The hydroalcoholic extract (HE) and infusion (BI) of Hancornia speciosa bark were investigated for their ability to prevent and heal rodent gastric ulcer.

Materials and methods
The preventive and healing action of both preparations of Hancornia speciosa were evaluated in experimental models in rodents that simulated this disease in human gastric mucosa.

Results
BI did not exert gastroprotective effect, in contrast to HE (500 mg/kg, p.o.) that decreased (p < 0.05) the severity of gastric damage induced by HCl/ethanol (52%), indomethacin/bethanechol (51%), stress (52%) or pylorus ligature experiments (54%). HE increased (p < 0.05) the pH and decreased acid output of gastric juice. This extract promoted increase of mucus amount (3.62 mg/wt. tissue vs. 5.81 mg/wt. tissue), healing action (67%) and displayed anti-Helicobacter pylori effect.

Conclusions
The antiulcer action of Hancornia speciosa resulted in increase of gastric mucus formation and antioxidant properties of polymeric proanthocyanidins present in the bark composition of this medicinal plant.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Byrsonima fagifolia: An integrative study to validate the gastroprotective, healing, antidiarrheal, antimicrobial and mutagenic action
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Byrsonima fagifolia: An integrative study to validate the gastroprotective, healing, antidiarrheal, antimicrobial and mutagenic action

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract
Ethnopharmacological relevance
Ethnopharmacological survey indicated leaves of Byrsonima fagifolia Nied. (Malpighiaceae) against gastrointestinal disorders.

Aim of the study
The methanolic extract from the leaves of Byrsonima fagifolia (denominated BF) was evaluated for toxic, mutagenic, gastroprotective, antidiarrheal, antibacterial and immunomodulatory activities.

Materials and methods
The preventive and healing action of BF against gastric ulcer was evaluated in experimental models in rodents. We evaluated immunomodulatory (by murine peritoneal macrophages), antidiarrheal (by induced diarrhea with castor oil and intestinal motility) and antibacterial action of BF against standard strain of Escherichia coli, Staphylococcus aureus and Helicobacter pylori. The safety of use of BF was also evaluated by mutagenic (Ames assay) and by analyses of toxicity parameters.

Results
Phytochemical BF profile indicated the presence of phenolic compounds with antioxidant and radical-scavenging properties. BF significantly inhibited gastric lesions induced by ethanol and HCl/ethanol and endogenous mucosal sulphydryl groups (SHs) participated efficaciously in BF gastroprotection. BF blocked development of inflammation process and also has antidiarrheal actions. This extract accelerated the healing of the gastric ulcerated mucosa by stimulating proliferative factors and by increasing production of gastric mucus with no toxic action. The substances responsible for the protective action are concentrated in the ethyl acetate fraction that demonstrated no mutagenic action in vitro.

Conclusions
Byrsonima fagifolia presents gastroprotective, healing and antidiarrheal activities supporting previous claims that its traditional use by Brazilians can treat these gastrointestinal ailments.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Modulatory Effect of Byrsonima basiloba Extracts on the Mutagenicity of Certain Direct and Indirect-Acting Mutagens in Salmonella typhimurium Assays
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Modulatory Effect of Byrsonima basiloba Extracts on the Mutagenicity of Certain Direct and Indirect-Acting Mutagens in Salmonella typhimurium Assays

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Byrsonima basiloba A. Juss. species is a native arboreal type from the Brazilian ?cerrado? (tropical American savanna), and the local population uses it to treat diseases, such as diarrhea and gastric ulcer. It belongs to the Malpighiaceae family, and it is commonly known as ?murici.? Considering the popular use of B. basiloba derivatives and the lack of pharmacological potential studies regarding this vegetal species, the mutagenic and antimutagenic effect of methanol (MeOH) and chloroform extracts were evaluated by the Ames test, using strains TA97a, TA98, TA100, and TA102 of Salmonella typhimurium. No mutagenic activity was observed in any of the extracts. To evaluate the antimutagenic potential, direct and indirect mutagenic agents were used: 4 nitro-o-phenylenediamine, sodium azide, mitomycin C, aflatoxin B1, benzo[a]pyrene, and hydrogen peroxide. Both the extracts evaluated showed antimutagenic activity, but the highest value of inhibition level (89%) was obtained with the MeOH extract and strain TA100 in the presence of aflatoxin B1. Phytochemical analysis of the extracts revealed the presence of n-alkanes, lupeol, ursolic and oleanolic acid, (+)-catechin, quercetin-3-O-α-L-arabinopyranoside, gallic acid, methyl gallate, amentoflavone, quercetin, quercetin-3-O-(2″-O-galloyl)-β-D-galactopyranoside, and quercetin-3-O-(2″-O-galloyl)-α-L-arabinopyranoside.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: High-performance liquid chromatographic separation and identification of polyphenolic compounds from the infusion ofDavilla elliptica St. Hill
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: High-performance liquid chromatographic separation and identification of polyphenolic compounds from the infusion of Davilla elliptica St. Hill

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The isolation of polyphenolic compounds from an infusion of the Brazilian plant Davilla elliptica (Dilleniaceae), used as tea by virtue of its digestive properties, is described. An improved preparative HPLC method was used in order to isolate pure polyphenols from the complex mixture. Liquid?liquid extraction and solid-phase extraction were employed to minimise the interference of polymeric compounds and to provide an enriched fraction of the compounds of interest. The identification of the isolated compounds was performed using analytical HPLC as well as direct injection electrospray ionisation ion trap tandem mass spectrometry (ESI-IT-MS/MS). The high flavonoid content suggests that D. elliptica may be a promising source of compounds to produce natural phytomedicines.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Davilla elliptica and Davilla nitida: Gastroprotective, anti-inflammatory immunomodulatory and anti-Helicobacter pylori action
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Davilla elliptica and Davilla nitida: Gastroprotective, anti-inflammatory immunomodulatory and anti-Helicobacter pylori action

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract
Ethnopharmacological relevance
Davilla elliptica and Davilla nitida are species commonly found in the Brazilian Cerrado biome.

Aim of the study
Based on ethnopharmacological and phytochemical analyses, methanolic extracts from leaves of Davilla elliptica (EDE) and Davilla nitida (EDN) were evaluated for their anti-ulcer, anti-inflammatory, immunological and anti-Helicobacter pylori activities.

Materials and methods
The gastroprotective action of both extracts was evaluated in rodent experimental models (HCl/ethanol, ethanol or NSAID). We also evaluated anti-inflammatory (carrageenin-induced rat hind paw edema), immunomodulatory (murine peritoneal macrophages) and antibacterial action of both extracts against a standard strain of Helicobacter pylori.

Results
EDE and EDN (500 mg/kg) were able to protect gastric mucosa against HCl/ethanol solution (EDE 63%; EDN 59%), absolute ethanol (EDE 95%; EDN 88%), and also against injurious effect of NSAID (EDE 77%; EDN 67%). When EDE and EDN were challenged with sulfhydryl depleter compound, the gastroprotective action of both extracts was completely abolished. EDE had gastroprotective effect related to increase of glutathione bioavailability and stimulated higher levels of NO, H2O2 and TNF-α production. Otherwise EDN showed better anti-Helicobacter pylori action than EDE. Neither extracts presented anti-inflammatory activity by oral route.

Conclusion
The phytochemical investigation showed that both extracts possess phenolic acid derivatives, acylglycoflavonoids and condensed tannins with evident quantitative variations that probably influenced the pharmacological differences between extracts.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Mouriri elliptica: Validation of gastroprotective, healing and anti-Helicobacter pylori effects
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Mouririelliptica: Validation of gastroprotective, healing and anti-Helicobacter pylori effects

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract
Ethnopharmacological relevance
Mouriri elliptica Martius (Melastomataceae) is species reputed in folk medicine to heal gastric ulcer and gastritis.

Aim of the study
Methanolic extract (ME) and ethyl acetate fraction (EAF) from leaves of Mouriri elliptica were evaluated for their gastroprotective, healing, immunological, toxicological and anti-Helicobacter pylori activities.

Material and methods
The gastroprotective action of ME and EAF was evaluated in rodent experimental models and to elucidate mechanisms of action, the antisecretory action, involvements of NO, SH, PGE2, anti-Helicobacter pylori action of ME was evaluated. We also used immunohistochemical (PCNA and COX-2) and immunomodulatory (murine peritoneal macrophages) assays to evaluate Mouriri elliptica effects.

Results
ME present gastroprotective action without antisecretory effect. Otherwise, ME showed anti-Helicobacter pylori action (MIC = 0.025 μg/mL) and was able to inhibit NO production by macrophages. This species also accelerate the healing of ulcerated gastric mucosa by stimulating proliferation factors (PCNA), COX-2 and maintained basal PGE2 level independent action of NSAID in gastric mucosa. The phytochemical investigation showed that this species possesses phenolic acid derivatives, acylglycoflavonoids and condensed tannins which probably influenced their pharmacological action.

Conclusion
All these results suggest the efficacy and safety of Mouriri elliptica in combating and healing gastric ulcer.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: The anti-ulcerogenic effects of Curatella americana L.
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The anti-ulcerogenic effects of Curatella americana L.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract
Ethnopharmacological relevance: Curatella americana L. (Dilleneaceae) is a medicinal plant very frequently cited as acting against gastrointestinal disorders in ethnopharmacological inventories of the Cerrado region of Brazil.

Aim of the study
The ethanolic extract (CEB) and infusion (BI) of Curatella americana bark were investigated for their ability to prevent and heal ulceration of the gastric mucosa.

Materials and methods
The preventive and healing actions of Curatella americana were evaluated in experimental in vivo models in rodents that simulated this disease in human gastric mucosa.

Results
CEB significantly decreased the severity of gastric damage formation induced by the combination of several gastroprotective models (HCl/ethanol, indomethacin/bethanecol, absolute ethanol, stress and pylorus ligature). But, unlike CEB, the BI did not exert gastroprotective effect. The gastroprotective action of CEB involved antisecretory action, augmentation of gastric mucus (48%) and participation of endogenous sulfhydryl compounds that increase efficacy of barrier mucosa against injurious agents. CEB also presents effective healing action in chronic gastric disease (1.90 0.55 vs. 6.86 0.46 mm2 in the control) and its action mechanisms consisted of increasing the PGE2 (40%) and somatostatin levels (269%) while decreasing the gastrin level in rat plasma (79%).

Conclusions
The gastroprotective effect and healing action of Curatella americana involved modulation of PGE2, somatostatin and gastrin levels, probably due to the presence of oligomeric and polymeric proanthocyanidins in the bark.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Anti-hemorrhagic Activity of Four Brazilian Vegetable Species Against Bothrops jararaca Venom
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Anti-hemorrhagic Activity of Four Brazilian Vegetable Species Against Bothrops jararaca Venom

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Around 20,000 snakebites are reported annually in Brazil and 90% of them are inflicted by species of the genus Bothrops. Intravenous administration of antibothropic antivenom neutralizes the systemic actions, but it is of little effect on the reversal of local symptoms and often induces adverse reactions, a context that drives the search for complementary treatments for snakebite accidents. Vegetable extracts with a range of antiophidian activities constitute an excellent alternative. In this study, we investigated the anti-hemorrhagic effects of Mouriri pusa Gardn. (Melastomataceae), Byrsonima crassa Niedenzu (Malpighiaceae), Davilla elliptica St. Hill. (Dilleniaceae) and Strychnos pseudoquina St. Hil. (Loganiaceae) against Bothrops jararaca venom. The methanolic extracts from M. pusa (leaves), B. crassa (leaves) and D. elliptica (leaves) showed total neutralization capacity against local hemorrhages. The amenthoflavone and quercetin fractions from B. crassa and the flavonoids fractions (quercetin and myricetin) from M. pusa and D. elliptica also showed total neutralization capacity. We conclude that flavonoids derived from myricetin, quercetin and amenthoflavone play an important role in the anti-hemorrhagic potential of these Brazilian vegetables species against B. jararaca venom.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Assessment of DNA damage induced by extracts, fractions and isolated compounds of Davilla nitida and Davilla elliptica (Dilleniaceae)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Assessment of DNA damage induced by extracts, fractions and isolated compounds of Davilla nitida and Davilla elliptica (Dilleniaceae)

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Mutation Research. Genetic Toxicology and Environmental Mutagenesis

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Davilla nitida and Davilla elliptica (Dilleniaceae) are plants that occur predominantly in the cerrado region of South America. They are used in popular medicine to treat stomach diseases, diarrhea and swelling, particularly of the lymph nodes and testicles. Chemical investigation of these two plant species led to the identification of the compounds myricetin-3-O-α-l-rhamnoside (myricitrin), quercetin-3-O-α-l-rhamnoside (quercitrin), myricetin, quercetin and gallic acid derivatives in the leaves of D. nitida and D. elliptica. Therefore, it was concluded that the two species of Davilla possess qualitatively similar chemical profiles. In the present study, the mutagenic and genotoxic potential of these plants and of their isolated compounds was tested in the Salmonella typhimurium assay (Ames test) with strains TA100, TA98, TA102 and TA97a, in the micronucleus test with peripheral blood cells of mice treated in vivo, and in plasmid DNA to analyze DNA strand-breaks. In the assessment of mutagenic potential by the Ames test, extracts from both plant species and a D. nitida ethyl-acetate fraction induced positive responses. On the other hand, none of the extracts showed genotoxic activity in the mouse cells. In the presence of metal ion, D. nitida and D. elliptica aqueous and ethyl-acetate fractions, as well as their isolated compounds, induced single- and double-strand-breaks in plasmid DNA in a cell-free system.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Determination of catechin diastereomers from the leaves of Byrsonima species using chiral HPLC-PAD-CD
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Determination of catechin diastereomers from the leaves of Byrsonima species using chiral HPLC-PAD-CD

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: When catechins are found in plant extracts, they are almost always identified as catechin and/or epicatechin probably due to stereoselectivity of the enzymes involved in the biosynthesis of these substances. However, the lack of reports regarding to ent-catechin as well as ent-epicatechin does not necessarily mean that these compounds have not been produced. In fact, most of the previous reports used chromatographic conditions not suitable for such separation. This article describes a simple and reliable analytical HPLC-PAD-CD method for simultaneous determination of catechin diastereomers both in infusions and extracts from the leaves of Byrsonima species. The direct separation of catechin, ent-catechin, epicatechin, and ent-epicatechin was obtained in normal phase by HPLC-PAD-CD using Chiralcel OD-H as chiral stationary phase and n-hexane/ethanol with 0.1% of TFA as mobile phase.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Anti-nociceptive effects of Carpolobia lutea G. Don (Polygalaceae) leaf fractions in animal models
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Anti-nociceptive effects of Carpolobia lutea G. Don (Polygalaceae) leaf fractions in animal models

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Leaves from Carpolobia lutea (Polygalaceae) were screened to establish the antiulcer ethnomedicinal claim and to quantitatively isolate, elucidate the active compounds by semi-preparative HPLC. The anti-nociceptive effects of Carpolobia lutea (CL) G. Don (Polygalaceae) organic leaf extracts were tested in experimental models in mice. The anti-nociceptive mechanism was determined using tail-flick test, acetic acid-induced abdominal constrictions, formalin-induced hind paw licking and the hot plate test. The fractions (ethanol, ethyl acetate, chloroform, n-hexane) and crude ethyl acetate extract of CL (770 mg/kg, i.p.) produced significant inhibitions of both phases of the formalin-induced pain in mice, a reduction in acetic acid-induced writhing as well as and an elevation of the pain threshold in the hot plate test in mice. The inhibitions were greater to those produced by indomethacin (5 mg/kg, i.p.). Ethyl acetate fraction revealed cinnamic and coumaric acids derivatives, which are described for the first time in literature. These cinnamalglucosides polyphenols characterised from CL may in part account for the pharmacological activities. These findings confirm its ethnomedical use in anti-inflammatory pain and in pains from gastric ulcer-associated symptoms.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Byrsonima intermedia A. Juss.: Gastric and duodenal anti-ulcer, antimicrobial and antidiarrheal effects in experimental rodent models
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Byrsonima intermedia A. Juss.: Gastric and duodenal anti-ulcer, antimicrobial and antidiarrheal effects in experimental rodent models

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Ethnopharmacological relevance
An ethnopharmacological survey indicated that the leaves of Byrsonima intermedia A. Juss. (Malpighiaceae), a medicinal species commonly found in the Brazilian Cerrado, can be used against gastroduodenal disorders, such as gastric ulcers and diarrhea.

Aim of the study
The objective of this study was to evaluate the effects of a methanolic extract of Byrsonima intermedia (MBI) leaves on gastric and duodenal ulcers and to assess the antimicrobial and antidiarrheal effects of this extract.

Material and methods
The anti-ulcerogenic effect of MBI was investigated with different ulcerogenic agents in rodents (mice and rats), including non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID), HCl/ethanol, pyloric ligature, absolute ethanol, cysteamine and ischemia?reperfusion. The gastroprotective effect of MBI was assessed by analysing the volume of gastric juice, pH, total acidity, mucus, NO, sulfhydryl compound, vanilloid receptor, glutathione (GSH) levels, and myeloperoxidase (MPO) activity in the gastric and duodenal mucosa. The gastric and duodenal healing effects of MBI were also evaluated during 7 or 14 days of treatment. The antidiarrheal action (measured by intestinal motility and diarrhea induced by castor oil) and anti-bacterial action of MBI against Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli and Helicobacter pylori were also evaluated by microdilution methods.

Results
The phytochemical profile from MBI indicated the presence of phenolic acids, flavan-3-ols, oligomeric proanthocyanidins, and flavonoids. MBI (500 mg/kg, p.o.) significantly inhibited totally gastric and duodenal lesions (69%) and healed gastric (49% on 14 days) and duodenal lesions (45% on 7 and 14 days). The MBI exert gastroprotective action by participation of endogenous sulfhydryl compounds, vanilloid receptors and increase in GSH level to effective gastric and duodenal protection. DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Characterization of Proanthocyanidins from Parkia biglobosa (Jacq.) G. Don. (Fabaceae) by Flow Injection Analysis - Electrospray Ionization Ion Trap Tandem Mass Spectrometry and Liquid Chromatography/Electrospray Ionization Mass Spectrometry
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Characterization of Proanthocyanidins from Parkia biglobosa (Jacq.) G. Don. (Fabaceae) by Flow Injection Analysis ? Electrospray Ionization Ion Trap Tandem Mass Spectrometry and Liquid Chromatography/Electrospray Ionization Mass Spectrometry

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The present study investigates the chemical composition of the African plant Parkia biglobosa (Fabaceae) roots and barks by Liquid Chromatography - Electrospray Ionization and Direct Injection Tandem Mass Spectrometry analysis. Mass spectral data indicated that B-type oligomers are present, namely procyanidins and prodelphinidins, with their gallate and glucuronide derivatives, some of them in different isomeric forms. The analysis evidenced the presence of up to 40 proanthocyanidins, some of which are reported for the first time. In this study, the antiradical activity of extracts of roots and barks from Parkia biglobosa was evaluated using DPPH method and they showed satisfactory activities.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Characterization of gallotannins from Astronium species by flow injection analysis-electrospray ionization-ion trap-tandem mass spectrometry and matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization time- of-flight mass spectrometry
Natural products: an extraordinary source of value-added compounds from diverse biomasses in Brazil

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Chemical and Biological Technologies in Agriculture

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The biodiversity of Brazil contains an extraordinary number of compounds from natural products with a wide and complex variety of molecular structures, therefore representing an economic potential in biomasses to be explored. Plant systems are the principal source of medicine and directly contribute to the development of new drugs in addition to agrochemicals, cosmetics, fine chemicals and nutraceuticals. Besides plants, other biomasses can be used as raw material, including marine organisms and microorganisms such as extremophilic and endophytic microbes. Interest in natural products for diverse uses is attributed to their different bioactivities, low toxicity and environmental sustainability. Based on these attributes, other non-biological applications of natural products from biomasses have been reported for use in textiles, antifouling coating in marine transportation, wood adhesives, industrial polymers and biofuel. After extractions of natural products of pharmaceutical interest or industrial application, such as polymers, or even of metabolites for biofuels, the residues (e.g., fibers) or other compounds (e.g., nutrients) are discarded generating unnecessary environmental pollution, but they could be used for the production of different value-added products. Some examples of residues that are being explored for added value by extracting other natural metabolites are olive and apple pomace, macauba and carnauba cakes, and cashew nut shell liquid. Residues and by-products derived from different biomasses in Brazil are a potential source of compounds of biological and industrial interest and therefore must be investigated in order to add value to the entire supply chain of natural product.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: The Anti-Inflammatory Effects of the Methanolic Extract and Fractions from Davilla elliptica St. Hil. (Dilleniaceae) on Bothrops jararaca Envenomation
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The Anti-Inflammatory Effects of the Methanolic Extract and Fractions from Davilla elliptica St. Hil. (Dilleniaceae) on Bothrops jararaca Envenomation

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Inflammation and haemorrhage are the main characteristics of tissue injury in botropic envenomation. Although some studies have shown that anti-venom prevents systemic reactions, it is not efficient in preventing tissue injury at the site of the bite. Therefore, this work was undertaken to investigate the anti-inflammatory effects of the methanolic extract and fractions from D. elliptica and to evaluate the role of matrix metalloproteinases (MMPs) in this process. Effects of the extract and fractions from D. elliptica were evaluated using a carrageenan-induced paw oedema model in rats, and leukocyte rolling was visualized by intravital. The quantification of MMPs activities (MMP-2 and MMP-9) extracted from the dermis of mice treated with extract and fractions alone or incubated with venom was determined by zymographic analyses. Our results show that intraperitoneal (i.p.) injection of fractions significantly reduced paw oedema after the carrageenan challenge. Treatment with the tannins fraction also resulted in considerable inhibition of the rolling of leukocytes and this fraction was able to decrease the activation of MMP-9. These results confirmed the anti-inflammatory activity of the methanolic extract and tannins fraction of D. elliptica and showed that the dermonecrosis properties of B. jararaca venom might be mediated through the inhibition of MMP-9 activity.
